SourceText: I've got another lesson ready for you! Are you ready to continue with your goal, @results.name?
text: Saya ada menyediakan pelajaran lain untuk anda! Adakah anda bersedia untuk meneruskan matlamat anda, @results.name?
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: Press a number on your keypad:
text: Tekan satu nombor pada pad kekunci anda:

SourceText: Sorry, I don't understand what you mean.
text: Maaf, saya tidak faham apa yang anda maksudkan.

note: This is a quick reply and its translation should be uniquely identified by the corresponding argument
This is a quick reply and its translation should be uniquely identified by the corresponding argument
This is an argument and it may be used to identify a corresponding quick reply
